subject: Football (College)
Child Abuse and Neglect
Sex Crimes
Colleges and Universities
Football
lead_paragraph: Joe Paterno’s tenure as coach of the Penn State football team will soon be over in the wake of a sex-abuse scandal that has implicated university officials, according to people briefed on the matter.
snippet: Joe Paterno’s tenure as coach of the Penn State football team will soon be over in the wake of a sex-abuse scandal that has implicated university officials, according to people briefed on the matter.
